metadata.name: 土 Tsuchi 1/3
metadata.description:
These 3 artworks were made for Design Week 2022 in Milan. They will be exhibited at Studio Rö.

The videos of the spheres are created using artificial intelligence with sound vibrations.

The first one is the vibration of the Earth (土 Tsuchi), the second one of the Nature (自然 Shizen) and the third one of the Brain (脳 Nô).

The difference in frequency can be clearly seen when looking at the 3 artworks.

The generated waves are also created with the help of sound vibrations.

The final rendering is generated with Blender.

The realizations will be available in 4K.

All this work is the result of about 3 weeks of work.
